info.title: PoYo AI - Generate Music API
info.description: AI-powered music generation with customizable styles and vocals

post.description: Generate music with or without vocals using AI models

input.prompt: A calm and relaxing piano track with soft melodies
input.title: Peaceful Piano Meditation

input.prompt: Write a song about summer love and beach sunsets
Epic orchestral soundtrack for a fantasy adventure
input.title: Dragon's Journey

BearerAuth.description:
All API endpoints require Bearer Token authentication

Get your API Key:

Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://poyo.ai/dashboard/api-key) to get your API Key

Add it to the request header:

```
Authorization: Bearer PoYo_API_KEY
```

model.description:
API model identifier.

Must be `generate-music` for this endpoint.

callback_url.description: Webhook callback URL for result notifications

prompt.description:
A description of the desired audio content.

- In Custom Mode ( `custom_mode: true` ): Required if `instrumental` is `false`. The prompt will be strictly used as the lyrics and sung in the generated track.
  Character limits by model:
  - **V4**: Maximum 3000 characters
  - **V4_5 & V4_5PLUS**: Maximum 5000 characters
  - **V4_5ALL**: Maximum 5000 characters
  - **V5**: Maximum 5000 characters

- In Non-custom Mode ( `custom_mode: false` ): Always required. The prompt serves as the core idea, and lyrics will be automatically generated based on it (not strictly matching the input). Maximum 500 characters.
  Example: "A short relaxing piano tune"
prompt.example: A calm and relaxing piano track with soft melodies

custom_mode.description:
Enable advanced parameter customization mode.

- When `true`: Enables full control over style, title, and other parameters. `style` and `title` become required fields.

- When `false`: Simplified mode where only `prompt` is needed. Lyrics will be automatically generated based on your prompt.

instrumental.description:
Specifies whether to generate instrumental music without vocals.

- When `true`: Produces pure instrumental track without any vocals. Only `style` and `title` are needed.

- When `false`: `style`, `prompt`, and `title` are required.

style.description:
Music style specification defining genre, mood, or artistic direction.

Required when `custom_mode` is `true`.

Character limits by model:
- **V4**: Maximum 200 characters
- **V4_5 & V4_5PLUS**: Maximum 1000 characters
- **V4_5ALL**: Maximum 1000 characters
- **V5**: Maximum 1000 characters

title.description:
Track title displayed in player and used for file naming.

Required when `custom_mode` is `true`.

Maximum 80 characters.

mv.description:
AI model version for music generation.

- **V5**: Superior musical expression, faster generation.
- **V4_5PLUS**: V4.5+ delivers richer sound, new ways to create, max 8 min.
- **V4_5**: V4.5 enables smarter prompts, faster generations, max 8 min.
- **V4_5ALL**: V4.5ALL enables smarter prompts, faster generations, max 8 min.
- **V4**: V4 improves vocal quality, max 4 min.

negative_tags.description:
Music styles or characteristics to exclude from generation.

Specify unwanted genres, moods, or instruments to avoid in the output.

vocal_gender.description:
Preferred vocal gender for the generated music.

- `m`: Male vocals
- `f`: Female vocals

Only effective when `custom_mode` is `true` and `instrumental` is `false`.

**Note**: This parameter increases the probability but cannot guarantee the specified gender.

style_weight.description:
Controls how strongly the specified style influences the generation.

Range: 0-1, up to 2 decimals.

Higher values result in stronger adherence to the specified style.

weirdness_constraint.description:
Controls the level of experimental creativity and unconventional elements.

Range: 0-1, up to 2 decimals.

- Lower values: More conventional music
- Higher values: More experimental and unique outputs

audio_weight.description:
Balances audio characteristics against other generation factors.

Range: 0-1, up to 2 decimals.

Adjusts the emphasis on audio quality and sonic features in the final output.

persona_id.description:
Persona ID to apply to the generated music.

Use this to apply a specific persona style to your music generation. Persona IDs are obtained through the persona creation endpoint.

Only available when Custom Mode is enabled.

How to generate persona_id, visit [generate-persona](/api-manual/music-series/generate-persona).

task_id.description: Unique task identifier for status tracking

created_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the task was created

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong
